name: Scrapshoot (itch)
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 32 (submission page), Scrapshoot is a side-scrolling space shooter that sees you captain a reverse-engineered scrap firing gunship. See how long you can survive.

Recently updated to the WebGL version.

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Mouse Button - Fire Turrets
  • Right Mouse Button - SCRAPCANNON!
  • R - Turbo Turrets!
